title: Week 4 preview & Dolphins vs. Bengals recap
itunes:title: Week 4 preview & Dolphins vs. Bengals recap
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler – go game-by-game breaking down each Week 4 matchup, and reveal which team is their “Lock of the Week”. Plus, the heroes recap the Thursday night game between the Miami Dolphins and the Cincinnati Bengals as the two teams fought for their second win of the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
